testcase.name: Verify the Wishlist with add and remove options
testcase.system-out: Given User is on DemoWebShop Web mainpage...................................passed When User Click the Search Feature..........................................passed And User Enter smartphone and click search option...........................passed And user pick the first smart phone.........................................passed And User add the smartphone into wishlist...................................passed And User verify the wishlist count..........................................passed And User remove the smartphone from the Wishlists...........................passed Then User Got the Wishlist add and remove function..........................passed
